org.apache.ignite

Interface IgnitionListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener

    public interface IgnitionListener
extends EventListener
    Listener for gird state change notifications. Use Ignition.addListener(IgnitionListener) to register this listener with grid factory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onStateChange(String name, IgniteState state)
      Listener for grid factory state change notifications.

    • Method Detail

      • onStateChange

        void onStateChange(@Nullable
                 String name,
                 IgniteState state)
        Listener for grid factory state change notifications.
        Parameters:
        name - Grid name (null for default un-named grid).
        state - New state.
